latex: Two permutations $a_1,a_2,\dots,a_{2010}$ and $b_1,b_2,\dots,b_{2010}$ of the numbers $1,2,\dots,2010$ are said to \textit{intersect} if $a_k=b_k$ for some value of $k$ in the range $1\le k\le 2010$.  Show that there exist $1006$ permutations of the numbers $1,2,\dots,2010$ such that any other such permutation is guaranteed to intersect at least one of these $1006$ permutations.
